ResearchProjectDef.label: dark archite harvesting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform a psychic ritual that causes a target to explode to harvest its dark archite genes. The harvested genes will can be reimplanted into another person afterwards.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->gathered tales of corrupted archite genes
subject_gerund->performing a ritual to harvest genes
subject_gerund->ripping genes out of a body
